  <body>
    <script>
      function solution(arr) {
        let answer = [];
        let sum = 0;
        let min = 1000;

        odd_arr = [];
        for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
          if (arr[i] % 2 != 0) odd_arr.push(arr[i]);
        }

        for (let i = 0; i < odd_arr.length; i++) {
          sum = sum + odd_arr[i];

          if (min > odd_arr[i]) min = odd_arr[i];
        }

        answer.push(sum);
        answer.push(min);

        return answer;
      }

      arr = [12, 77, 38, 41, 53, 92, 85];
      console.log(solution(arr));
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
